main event: A civilian observed a UFO in Poughkeepsie, New York on August 25, 1952.
interesting points: The object was reported to be 5123 yards off the ground and the size of a baseball., The shape of the object changed from round to cigar., The speed of the object varied, moving to top level and then back to the ground., The observation lasted for about 10 seconds., The report concluded that the object could be a balloon, possibly aircraft, or astronomical in nature.
